Content: <@206527186960646145> Neither the Java Edition_ nor Bedrock server should ever need to run as `root`_ so using `sudo` broke stuff and possibly opened security holes.
<@219935476495286272> Hmm â€¦ have your friend download the world savs_ try opening it locally on the device_ and finally. only if they can successfully Save & Quit_ upload what they just played.
